Package camzup.core

Interface ISpatial2

All Known Implementing Classes:
CamEntity2, CurveEntity2, Entity2, ImageEntity2, MaterialPImage, MaterialUv, MeshEntity2, TextEntity2, Transform2
public interface ISpatial2
Maintains consistent behavior for 2D animated objects that move in space.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vec2 getLocation​(Vec2 target)
    Gets the spatial object's location.
    ISpatial2 moveBy​(Vec2 dir)
    Moves this object by a vector.
    ISpatial2 moveTo​(Vec2 locNew)
    Moves this object to a location.
    ISpatial2 moveTo​(Vec2 locNew, float step)
    Moves this object to a location over a step in time.

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      Vec2 getLocation​(Vec2 target)
      Gets the spatial object's location.
      Parameters:
      target - the output vector
      Returns:
      the location

    • moveBy

      ISpatial2 moveBy​(Vec2 dir)
      Moves this object by a vector.
      Parameters:
      dir - the vector
      Returns:
      this object

    • moveTo

      ISpatial2 moveTo​(Vec2 locNew)
      Moves this object to a location.
      Parameters:
      locNew - the location
      Returns:
      this object

    • moveTo

      ISpatial2 moveTo​(Vec2 locNew, float step)
      Moves this object to a location over a step in time.
      Parameters:
      locNew - the location
      step - the step
      Returns:
      this object
